title: Gymnopilus rufobrunneus
text:
Gymnopilus rufobrunneus is a species of <a href="mushroom">mushroom</a>-forming <a href="fungus">fungus</a> in the family <a href="Hymenogastraceae">Hymenogastraceae</a>.
Description.
The <a href="pileus%20%28mycology%29">cap</a> is in diameter.
Habitat and distribution.
"Gymnopilus rufobrunneus" grows in clusters on the soil, and has been found in <a href="Idaho">Idaho</a> during September.
